Uses of Class
LogicBlock

  • Packages that use LogicBlock 
    Package Description
    &lt;Unnamed&gt;  

    • Uses of LogicBlock in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of LogicBlock in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionLogicBlock
      An ActionLogicBlock is a LogicBlock that represents an action that should occur in the system when the appropriate triggers have occurred.
      class  AndLogicBlock
      An AndLogicBlock is a LogicBlock that has an output values of true when the output values of all LogicBlock objects in prevBlocks are true.
      class  OrLogicBlock
      An OrLogicBlock is a LogicBlock that has an output value of true when the output value of one or more LogicBlock objects in prevBlocks is true.
      class  TriggerLogicBlock
      A TriggerLogicBlock is a LogicBlock that represents a trigger occurring in the system.
      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type LogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> Service.logicBlocks
      An ArrayList containing all of the LogicBlock objects that are used in this Service.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> LogicBlock.nextBlocks
      An ArrayList of next LogicBlock objects.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> LogicBlock.prevBlocks
      An ArrayList of previous LogicBlock objects.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return LogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static LogicBlock Service.addTriggerCombinationToSystem(java.lang.String triggerCombinations, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggerBlocks, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals, java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> serviceBlocks)
      This method adds LogicBlock objects that follow the interpretation of a set of triggerCombinations to the system represented by a given ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type LogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> Service.addServiceToSystem(java.lang.String representation, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggerBlocks, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals)
      This method adds a service that follows a given representation to the system represented by a given ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> Service.getLogicBlocks()
      Returns an ArrayList containing all of the LogicBlock objects that make up this Service.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type LogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LogicBlock.addNextBlock(LogicBlock block)
      Add a LogicBlock to the list of next LogicBlock objects, nextBlocks.
      void ActionLogicBlock.addNextBlock(LogicBlock block)
      This method overrides the addNextBlock method in LogicBlock so that the method does nothing because ActionLogicBlock objects have no next blocks.
      void TriggerLogicBlock.addPrevBlock(LogicBlock block)
      This method overrides the addPrevBlock method in LogicBlock so that the method does nothing because TriggerLogicBlock objects have no previous blocks.
      void LogicBlock.addPrevBlock(LogicBlock block)
      Add a LogicBlock to the list of previous LogicBlock objects, prevBlocks.
      private void LogicBlock.removeNextBlock(LogicBlock block)
      Remove a specified LogicBlock from the list of next LogicBlock objects, nextBlocks.
      private void LogicBlock.removePrevBlock(LogicBlock block)
      Remove a specified LogicBlock from the list of previous LogicBlock objects, prevBlocks.
      Method parameters in <Unnamed> with type arguments of type LogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static LogicBlock Service.addTriggerCombinationToSystem(java.lang.String triggerCombinations, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggerBlocks, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals, java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> serviceBlocks)
      This method adds LogicBlock objects that follow the interpretation of a set of triggerCombinations to the system represented by a given ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      private static void Service.removeBlocks(java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggers, java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> blocksToDelete)
      Removes a specified list of logic blocks from a Service by calling the removeFromService method in the LogicBlock class.
